edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

Interface SourceFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSourceFilter, DTUSourceFilter, PhrasalSourceFilter

    public interface SourceFilter
    Filter for phrase extraction: a given phrase pair (F,E) is extracted and weighed only if F is listed is accepted by the filter.
    Author:
    Michel Galley

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allows(AlignmentTemplate alTemp)
      Determines whether or not phrase alTemp should be extracted and weighed.
      void filterAgainstCorpus(String sourceLanguageCorpus)
      All source-language phrases found in sourceLanguageCorpus are added to the filter.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Is filter enabled?
      void lock()
      Once a SourceFilter instance is locked, no more phrases can be added to the filter.
      void setRange(int startId, int endId)
      Only filter extraction against phrases whose ids range between startId and endId.
      int size()
      Number of source phrases in the filter.

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Is filter enabled?

      • allows

        boolean allows(AlignmentTemplate alTemp)
        Determines whether or not phrase alTemp should be extracted and weighed.

      • filterAgainstCorpus

        void filterAgainstCorpus(String sourceLanguageCorpus)
        All source-language phrases found in sourceLanguageCorpus are added to the filter.
        Parameters:
        sourceLanguageCorpus -

      • size

        int size()
        Number of source phrases in the filter.

      • setRange

        void setRange(int startId,
            int endId)
        Only filter extraction against phrases whose ids range between startId and endId.

      • lock

        void lock()
        Once a SourceFilter instance is locked, no more phrases can be added to the filter. Note: Locking the filter speeds up multi-threaded phrase extraction with some instantiations of SourceFilter (e.g., PhrasalSourceFilter and DTUSourceFilter), since these instantiations can operate without synchronization.
